dt: {bc}to treat with excessive leniency, generosity, or consideration

pt: {sc}indulge{/sc} {sc}pamper{/sc} {sc}humor{/sc} {sc}spoil{/sc} {sc}baby{/sc} {sc}mollycoddle{/sc} mean to show undue favor to a person's desires and feelings. {sc}indulge{/sc} implies excessive compliance and weakness in gratifying another's or one's own desires.

pt.t: {it}indulged{/it} myself with food at the slightest excuse

pt: {sc}pamper{/sc} implies inordinate gratification of desire for luxury and comfort with consequent enervating effect.

pt.t: {it}pampered{/it} by the amenities of modern living

pt: {sc}humor{/sc} stresses a yielding to a person's moods or whims.

pt.t: {it}humored{/it} him by letting him tell the story

pt: {sc}spoil{/sc} stresses the injurious effects on character by indulging or pampering.
{sc}baby{/sc} suggests excessive care, attention, or solicitude.
{sc}mollycoddle{/sc} suggests an excessive degree of care and attention to another's health or welfare.

shortdef: to yield to the desire of : humor
to treat with excessive leniency, generosity, or consideration

dt: {bc}to become involved in (something, especially something that is considered wrong or improper)

dt.t: Both candidates have promised not to {it}indulge in{/it} further personal attacks for the remainder of the campaign.

shortdef: to become involved in (something, especially something that is considered wrong or improper)
